name: 3D Police Run Drag Racing Simulator - A Real Cops Chase Driving Race
name_original: 3D Police Run Drag Racing Simulator - A Real Cops Chase Driving Race
description:
Choose one of the four cars, fasten your seatbelt and start the engine. All checked? Now brace yourself for a nerve racking escape from the police. You will have to avoid the traffic, dangerous road works and all other obstacles you will come across. While you race your way to freedom on treacherous cliffs, quiet suburbs or a dirty ditch you must collect bonus stars and most importantly do not get caught!

Game features:

- Retina ready graphics
- Nerve-racking gameplay
- Online leaderboard
- Unlimited retries
